passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > section:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > header:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(4) > footer > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > form:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(5) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(4) > footer > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > form:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(6) > h2:nth-child(1)
